case_names: Anaheim Gardens v. United States
summaries: REPORTED OPINION granting Motion for Summary Judgment denying [430] Motion in Limine denying [452] Motion in Limine. The clerks office is directed to CORRECT the docket in Case No. 93-6582 to change the name of the plaintiff from Silverlake Village, L.P. to 3740 Silverlake Village, L.P., as explained in footnote 4 of this opinion. For docket clarity, a copy of this opinion shall be filed in each of the six member cases. The clerks office is directed to ENTER final judgment for defendant and DISMISS all of the claims in each of the following member cases, with prejudice: Buckman Gardens L.P., et al. v. United States, Case No. 97-5837 Chauncy House Company v. United States, Case No. 97-5845 Cedar Gardens Associates v. United States, Case No. 93-6568 Rock Creek Terrace L.P. v. United States, Case No. 93-6578 620 Su Casa Por Cortez v. United States, Case No. 93-6580 and 3740 Silverlake Village, L.P. v. United States, Case No. 93-6582. The pretrial conference scheduled for September 27, 2018, is CANCELLED. The trial scheduled for October 15-26, 2018, is CANCELLED. The parties shall CONFER and FILE a Joint Status Report on or before 10/22/2018 proposing further proceedings in this matter. Signed by Judge Patricia E. Campbell-Smith. (TQ) Service on parties made.
